channel.title: Instructables Intro
channel.description:
Hi!
I made a small instructable to get hands on the Axoloti with a customized controller. Feel free to give me feedback or any kind of hint, if there´s something wrong.
https://www.instructables.com/id/Simple-Synth-Axoloti-Controller-and-Software-Intro/
greetings

Simple Synth - Axoloti Controller and Software Intro

Axoloti is a versatile sound board which is programmable very much like an Arduino, just with a nodebased sound development environment. Patches programmed there are...
